attributes.action: Pass Legislation Allowing Homeowners the Right to defend their property without fear of prosecution
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I feel we should have a system like that in America where a property owner can protect themselves and their property by ANY MEANS NECESSARY without being prosecuted. For too long it is the innocent householder who is arrested for simply defending themself against an intruder. The current system is a joke and the very reason I have no faith whatsoever in English Justice.
